entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -16.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 8:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -16.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -20.9°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
